name: Moza Master
description: The MOZA Master App offers comprehensive camera control for easy photo taking and video recording by connecting the gimbal to the mobile phone. Combined with a variety of intelligent features like motion-lapse and track, MOZA Master can fully inspire your creativity. Easy-to-understand operation, multiple gimbal and camera settings, this is a must-have tool to make shooting easier.
